title: Large-Scale ICT-Integrated Science Project-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens with advanced expertise in science, operating in an environment enabling real-time collaboration via personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to analyze and solve science project problems using ICT tools
Learners can systematically explain scientific concepts through digital content creation (e.g., videos)

Learners must share at least three pieces of knowledge related to science experiments with peers using online collaboration tools (e.g., Google Docs, Padlet) and provide specific feedback on at least two peer submissions with over 80% participation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
